metadata.title: CVE-2015-6727 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Special:DeletedContributions page in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.xbefore 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 allows remote attackers todetermine if an IP is autoblocked via the "Change block" text.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
